Requisitos mínimos
In order to increase the capabilities of our Quality department we need to incorporate a Quality Engineer with the following skills:
Technnical Proficiency
- Understanding of Quality Standards ISO 9001, AS9100
- Statistical Analysis
- Knowledge of Manufacturing Processes
Communication Skills
- Supplier Relationship Management
- Cross-fuctional Teamwork
- Reporting and Documentation
Problem Solving Abilities
- Root Cause Analysis
- Risk Management
- Auditing Expertise
Personal Effectiveness
- Adaptability and Continuos Learning
QMS (Quality Management Systems): It is essential to comprehend and have experience with QMS standards such as ISO 9001, 9100, or other pertinent certifications. Documentation, audits, and compliance standards need to be familiar to you.
Technical knowledge: Technical Knowledge can include understanding of materials, production techniques, or product design,. Understanding engineering drawings and technical standards is crucial.
Problem-Solving Ability: Excellent analytical ability to recognise, evaluate, and fix quality-related problems. This covers methods for root cause analysis such as Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA), Fishbone diagrams, and the Five Whys.
Statistical Analysis: Expertise in using statistical tools and techniques, such as Control Charts, Design of Experiments), and Statistical Process Control (SPC), to analyse high-quality data.
- Communication Skills: Interacting with vendors, internal teams, and stakeholders requires effective communication.
- Project Management: Proficiency in project management, encompassing the strategic development, implementation, and oversight of supplier quality enhancement programmes.
- Supplier Management: The capacity to evaluate and oversee the performance of suppliers, carry out audits, and create improvement plans is known as supplier management. Developing a solid relationship with suppliers is essential.
- Paying close attention to details: Being exact while assessing procedures, carrying out quality checks, and examining data to guarantee compliance with guidelines and requirements.
- Technical writing: The capacity to clearly and concisely generate and assess high-quality documentation, such as reports, processes, and corrective action plans.
- Regulatory Knowledge: Knowledge of industry-specific rules and guidelines that affect quality, like the requirements for AESA/EASA regulations for aero devices.
- Negotiation Skills: The capacity to bargain with suppliers to get favourable terms, cost savings, or improvements in quality.
- Software Proficiency: Working knowledge of ERP programmes, quality management software, and data analysis tools
- Continuous Improvement: The application of concepts and techniques from continuous improvement, such as Kaizen, Six Sigma, and Lean, to increase quality.
The salary range will depend on the worth and experience of the candidate.
Descripción
TEMAI somos una empresa aeronáutica focalizada en la investigación, desarrollo e innovación tecnológica, con la misión de establecer relaciones a largo plazo con clientes, empleados y partners tecnológicos, focalizándose en el desempeño de la calidad, actividades de I+D+i y desarrollo de productos tecnológicos innovadores para el sector aeronáutico.
Nuestras áreas de negocio engloban el diseño y desarrollo de equipos electrónicos y electromecánicos de vuelo basados en normas DO-254 y DO-160 con software crítico embebido basado en norma DO-178, la realización de ensayos de calificación, la certificación de producto y la producción, el diseño y desarrollo de bancos de prueba y ensayo coordinando el proceso de ingeniería bajo norma UNE-EN-9100, y la realización de proyectos tecnológicos de investigación aplicada en programas europeos y nacionales en consorcios especializados.
Tipo de industria de la oferta
Industria aeroespacial y aviación

Descripción
For REWE digital Spain, a subsidiary of REWE Group, located in the Technological Park of Andalusia (PTA) in Malaga we are looking for a Software Developer. They will join the Product Layout Management team and will support us in the creation of the Store Layouting business area. Store Layouting comprises the overall concept and division/sizing of the sales areas or sections within a store including the design and placement of merchandise on the shelves, as well as the presentation and arrangement of items (groups).
What you will do
· Working cross-functionally in an agile product team on Google Cloud Platform (serverless).
· Designing, programming, QA and code documentation, with a backend focus.
· Planning architectures and contribute with your ideas.
· Analysing requirements as well as system design and programming.
· Configure and deploy systems with corresponding testing and validation.
What you will bring
· Degree in Computer Sciences or several years of experience in a similar position
· Several years of experience in SQL and Java.
· Experience with Cloud computing and messaging systems (Kafka, JMS or MQ)
· Good knowledge of CI/CD
· Experienced in microservices and containers (Docker and Kubernetes)
· Excellent problem-solving skills and starving eager to keep learning and touching exploring new languages and frameworks, such as Kotlin and Quarkus.
· Complete fluency in English language skills.
· You live in Spain, and you have a valid work permit/VISA (without sponsorship)
Nice to have
· German language skills.
What we Offer
· A startup-like culture with fascinating opportunities, combined with the security of being part of a major corporate force in the REWE Group.
· Challenging tasks but also a tech playground
· Work in a modern office, fostering creativity, collaboration, and agility.
· A flexible, autonomous work environment where your ideas will contribute to our collective success.
· Open communication culture in an international environment with steady growth, and more to come!
Our Benefits
· Hybrid work and flexible working time;
· Private health insurance
· Ticket Restaurant
· Professional development opportunities: English/German courses available and further IT education/trainings.
· 23 days paid vacation.
As the central solution provider for information and telecommunications systems we plan, develop, configure, and operate efficient systems and applications for the REWE Group, one of the leading trade and tourism groups in Germany and Europe with around 390,000 employees.
Our team of more than 2,200 IT specialists sets standards for IT implementation in the retail industry and develops new technologies for the sector. Today, we manage more than 80 logistics centers and more than 23,000 local network connections to ensure the continuous supply of data to the 32,000 scanner checkout counters in more than 7,300 stores.
What are you waiting for? Our expansion in Spain is an invitation for you to shape the future for millions of customers - every day. Join us as we pioneer nearshore activities and write the next chapter of our digital conquest. Ready to redefine digital retail? ¡Vámonos!
Find your place at the Home of IT. Apply now in English with your salary expectations.
Every person is different. We appreciate that. We appreciate and embrace all aspects of diversity and differentness - in technology and tools, languages and software, cooperation, and collaboration.
Data protection information for your online application on our website https://rewe-digital.dvinci-hr.com/en/jobs
